final_questions: Name 4 out of the 8 objects that represent Americana in the album art. NO PEEKING YOU CHEATING CHEATERS
final_answers: Milkshake, Baseball Bats, Baseball, Red Convertible, Motel Signs, Route 66 sign, Palm Trees, Records
